[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/mod.rs] [Command: Reject] [Rejection Bypass] Can the rejection mechanism be bypassed by dispatching Execute commands before sufficient rejections are accumulated? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/mod.rs] [Command: ExecuteReject] [State Finalization] Does ExecuteReject properly finalize rejected transaction state, or can transactions be resurrected after rejection? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/mod.rs] [Error Handling] [Information Leakage] Do error messages from execute_serialized() leak sensitive information about account states, private keys, or internal system structure? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/mod.rs] [Error Handling] [Panic Safety] Are all potential panics in submodule executions properly caught at the dispatch layer, or can they crash the entire CLI process? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/mod.rs] [Module Architecture] [Privilege Separation] Does the dispatch architecture enforce proper privilege separation between read-only operations (Balance, List, LookupAddress) and state-modifying operations? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/mod.rs] [Command Execution] [Audit Trail] Does the dispatch layer maintain an audit trail of executed commands for security monitoring and forensic analysis? (Low)
